example.eg: The coder used a placeholder until the actual values were decided on.
A placeholder was appointed until the next elections are held.

dsense.name: placeholder
dsense.guideword: (symbol: can be replaced by number) (数学术语)

example.eg: We will use placeholders since we do not know the exact values yet.
Placeholders are often important for grammatical structure.
Add a placeholder to the calendar so people know the proposed time for the meeting.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 暂时预订, 临时预订
